txt.en:
'Some new information has shed some light on these new happenings. I shall try to glean more information from the sash you brought back.

'Recently, while out hunting, the folk have noticed a camp in the hills to the north. It has always been empty according to their reports, but there is evidence of recent use.

'As with all cases, this cannot be mere coincidence. It suggests that whoever we are dealing with will not be here for long.'
Talk to Hadorion in Barad Faen
You found a strange note with barely visible markings. Bring it back to Hadorion.\n\nHadorion can be found in his cabin in Barad Faen.
Hadorion has happened upon more information during his investigation.
A Vile Trail Marked by Sea
Hadorion wants you to check on a new camp that has been erected to the north.

'What's written on this note is barely readable, but this last line here is of concern: \qIt is time.\q It seems we are out of time. Whatever they were planning to do, they plan to do soon.\n\n'I think I may have everything I need to solve this case.'
The note is barely readable. Maybe Hadorion can make sense of it.
